channel.title: Terminal Linux VPS
channel.description:
How can I run my PI server on my Linux vps through dropbox? I heard it's possible. I also need to know if I should make my client connect to port 22. I also need to install jdk.
My run is [code=Batch] @echo off title FreshScape "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\java.exe" -Xmx512m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause [/code]

item.title: Terminal Linux VPS
item.dc:creator: @Mill Mill
item.description:
@Mill wrote:

How can I run my PI server on my Linux vps through dropbox? I heard itâ€™s possible. I also need to know if I should make my client connect to port 22. I also need to install jdk.

My run is

@echo off
title FreshScape
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\java.exe" -Xmx512m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause
